org.apache.tuscany.sca.cpp.tools.common
Class Options

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.tuscany.sca.cpp.tools.common.Options
public class Options
extends java.lang.Object

Command line options passed to a tool's main program. All command line options should begin with a dash "-". Some command line options take a value which is the next parameter after the option. Others do not.

Method Summary
static boolean debug()
          This option will cause scagen to print out some basic internal log type messages
static boolean deploy()
          This option will cause scagen to print out some text that can be used or pasted into a command file to copy all the relevant artefacts from where they are found or generated to a specific deployment location
static java.lang.Object getOption(java.lang.String key)
           
static boolean list()
          This option is useful only when used in conjunction with the "-deploy" option.
static boolean noGenerate()
          This option will prevent scagen from actually writing out the generated files.
static boolean outputCommand()
          This option is useful only when used in conjunction with the "-deploy" option.
static boolean quiet()
          This option is maintained for compatibility with the original package source.
static void reset()
           
static void set(java.lang.String[] args)
          Initialises the options based on the args passed to main
static boolean verbose()
          This option will cause scagen to print out messages about the artefacts it is processing

verbose

public static boolean verbose()
This option will cause scagen to print out messages about the artefacts it is processing

Returns:

debug

public static boolean debug()
This option will cause scagen to print out some basic internal log type messages

Returns:

deploy

public static boolean deploy()
This option will cause scagen to print out some text that can be used or pasted into a command file to copy all the relevant artefacts from where they are found or generated to a specific deployment location

Returns:

noGenerate

public static boolean noGenerate()
This option will prevent scagen from actually writing out the generated files. It is useful if used in conjunction with the "-deploy" option.

Returns:

outputCommand

public static boolean outputCommand()
This option is useful only when used in conjunction with the "-deploy" option. It changes the output to be more like the source code of a command script to copy the files to a specific place.

Returns:

list

public static boolean list()
This option is useful only when used in conjunction with the "-deploy" option. It changes the output to be a simple list of artefacts. It has no effect if the "-outputCommand" option is set.

Returns:

quiet

public static boolean quiet()
This option is maintained for compatibility with the original package source. It is not used by new scagen code.

Returns:
